entry.title: Sunday night: Clear. Low minus 32.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 32. Wind chill minus 27 this evening and minus 38 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 8:22 PM CST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of snow. High minus 12. POP 60%
entry.summary: Clear early in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud with 60 percent chance of snow late in the morning and in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 12. Wind chill minus 38 in the morning and minus 16 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 8:22 PM CST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of snow. Low minus 31. POP 60%
